text: Sid Meier (born on February 24, 1954, in Sarnia, Ontario) is an Canadian- American video game developer, most well-known for his turn-based strategy games. He founded Microprose in 1982, with Bill Stealey. In 1996, he left Microprose and joined Firaxis Games.
